00056 subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00057               dvar, has_dvar )
00058    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00059    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00060    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00061    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00062    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00063    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00064    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00065    type(settings_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00066    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00067 
00068    integer                                      :: att_
00069    integer                                      :: noatt_
00070    logical                                      :: error
00071    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00072    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00073    logical                                         :: has_histories
00074    logical                                         :: has_seed
00075    logical                                         :: has_source_type
00076    logical                                         :: has_source_path
00077    has_histories                        = .false.
00078    has_seed                             = .false.
00079    has_source_type                      = .false.
00080    has_source_path                      = .false.
00081    call init_xml_type_settings_xml(dvar)
00082    has_dvar = .true.
00083    error  = .false.
00084    att_   = 0
00085    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00086    endtag_org = endtag
00087    do
00088       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00089          noattribs = 0
00090          tag = starttag
00091       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00092          att_      = att_ + 1
00093          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00094             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00095             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00096             noattribs = 0
00097             nodata    = 1
00098             endtag    = .false.
00099          else
00100             tag       = starttag
00101             noattribs = 0
00102             nodata    = 0
00103             endtag    = .true.
00104             cycle
00105          endif
00106       else
00107          if ( endtag_org ) then
00108             return
00109          else
00110             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00111             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00112                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00113                error = .true.
00114                return
00115             endif
00116          endif
00117       endif
00118       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00119          exit
00120       endif
00121       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00122          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00123             cycle
00124          else
00125             exit
00126          endif
00127       endif
00128       select case( tag )
00129       case('histories')
00130          call read_xml_integer( &
00131             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00132             dvar%histories, has_histories )
00133       case('seed')
00134          call read_xml_integer( &
00135             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00136             dvar%seed, has_seed )
00137       case('source_type')
00138          call read_xml_integer( &
00139             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00140             dvar%source_type, has_source_type )
00141       case('source_path')
00142          call read_xml_word( &
00143             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00144             dvar%source_path, has_source_path )
00145       case ('comment', '!--')
00146          ! Simply ignore
00147       case default
00148          if ( strict_ ) then
00149             error = .true.
00150             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00151                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00152          endif
00153       end select
00154       nodata = 0
00155       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00156    end do
00157    if ( .not. has_histories ) then
00158       has_dvar = .false.
00159       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on histories')
00160    endif
00161    if ( .not. has_seed ) then
00162       has_dvar = .false.
00163       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on seed')
00164    endif
00165    if ( .not. has_source_type ) then
00166       has_dvar = .false.
00167       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on source_type')
00168    endif
00169    if ( .not. has_source_path ) then
00170       has_dvar = .false.
00171       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on source_path')
00172    endif
00173 end subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml
00174 subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml_array( dvar )
00175    type(settings_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: dvar
00176    if ( associated( dvar ) ) then
00177       deallocate( dvar )
00178    endif
00179    allocate( dvar(0) )
00180 end subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml_array
00181 subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml(dvar)
00182    type(settings_xml) :: dvar

00184 subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml_array( &
00185       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00186    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00187    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00188    integer                                         :: indent
00189    type(settings_xml), dimension(:)        :: dvar
00190    integer                                         :: i
00191    do i = 1,size(dvar)
00192        call write_xml_type_settings_xml( info, tag, indent, dvar(i) )

00195 
00196 subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml( &
00197       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00198    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00199    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00200    integer                                         :: indent
00201    type(settings_xml)                      :: dvar
00202    character(len=100)                              :: indentation
00203    indentation = ' '
00204    write(info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)),&
00205        '<',trim(tag), '>'
00206    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'histories', indent+3, dvar%histories)
00207    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'seed', indent+3, dvar%seed)
00208    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'source_type', indent+3, dvar%source_type)
00209    call write_to_xml_word( info, 'source_path', indent+3, dvar%source_path)
00210    write(info%lun,'(4a)') indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00211        '</' //trim(tag) // '>'
00212 end subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml

00240 subroutine read_xml_type_nuclide_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00241               dvar, has_dvar )
00242    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00243    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00244    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00245    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00246    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00247    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00248    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00249    type(nuclide_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00250    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00251 
00252    integer                                      :: att_
00253    integer                                      :: noatt_
00254    logical                                      :: error
00255    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00256    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00257    logical                                         :: has_N
00258    logical                                         :: has_A
00259    logical                                         :: has_path
00260    logical                                         :: has_thermal
00261    has_N                                = .false.
00262    has_A                                = .false.
00263    has_path                             = .false.
00264    has_thermal                          = .false.
00265    call init_xml_type_nuclide_xml(dvar)
00266    has_dvar = .true.
00267    error  = .false.
00268    att_   = 0
00269    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00270    endtag_org = endtag
00271    do
00272       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00273          noattribs = 0
00274          tag = starttag
00275       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00276          att_      = att_ + 1
00277          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00278             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00279             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00280             noattribs = 0
00281             nodata    = 1
00282             endtag    = .false.
00283          else
00284             tag       = starttag
00285             noattribs = 0
00286             nodata    = 0
00287             endtag    = .true.
00288             cycle
00289          endif
00290       else
00291          if ( endtag_org ) then
00292             return
00293          else
00294             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00295             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00296                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00297                error = .true.
00298                return
00299             endif
00300          endif
00301       endif
00302       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00303          exit
00304       endif
00305       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00306          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00307             cycle
00308          else
00309             exit
00310          endif
00311       endif
00312       select case( tag )
00313       case('N')
00314          call read_xml_double( &
00315             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00316             dvar%N, has_N )
00317       case('A')
00318          call read_xml_double( &
00319             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00320             dvar%A, has_A )
00321       case('path')
00322          call read_xml_word( &
00323             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00324             dvar%path, has_path )
00325       case('thermal')
00326          call read_xml_logical( &
00327             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00328             dvar%thermal, has_thermal )
00329       case ('comment', '!--')
00330          ! Simply ignore
00331       case default
00332          if ( strict_ ) then
00333             error = .true.
00334             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00335                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00336          endif
00337       end select
00338       nodata = 0
00339       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00340    end do
00341    if ( .not. has_N ) then
00342       has_dvar = .false.
00343       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on N')
00344    endif
00345    if ( .not. has_A ) then
00346       has_dvar = .false.
00347       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on A')
00348    endif
00349    if ( .not. has_path ) then
00350       has_dvar = .false.
00351       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on path')
00352    endif
00353    if ( .not. has_thermal ) then
00354       has_dvar = .false.
00355       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on thermal')
00356    endif

00380 subroutine write_xml_type_nuclide_xml( &

00424 subroutine read_xml_type_material_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00425               dvar, has_dvar )
00426    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00427    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00428    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00429    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00430    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00431    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00432    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00433    type(material_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00434    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00435 
00436    integer                                      :: att_
00437    integer                                      :: noatt_
00438    logical                                      :: error
00439    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00440    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00441    logical                                         :: has_nuclides
00442    has_nuclides                         = .false.
00443    allocate(dvar%nuclides(0))
00444    call init_xml_type_material_xml(dvar)
00445    has_dvar = .true.
00446    error  = .false.
00447    att_   = 0
00448    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00449    endtag_org = endtag
00450    do
00451       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00452          noattribs = 0
00453          tag = starttag
00454       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00455          att_      = att_ + 1
00456          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00457             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00458             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00459             noattribs = 0
00460             nodata    = 1
00461             endtag    = .false.
00462          else
00463             tag       = starttag
00464             noattribs = 0
00465             nodata    = 0
00466             endtag    = .true.
00467             cycle
00468          endif
00469       else
00470          if ( endtag_org ) then
00471             return
00472          else
00473             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00474             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00475                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00476                error = .true.
00477                return
00478             endif
00479          endif
00480       endif
00481       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00482          exit
00483       endif
00484       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00485          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00486             cycle
00487          else
00488             exit
00489          endif
00490       endif
00491       select case( tag )
00492       case('nuclide')
00493          call read_xml_type_nuclide_xml_array( &
00494             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00495             dvar%nuclides, has_nuclides )
00496       case ('comment', '!--')
00497          ! Simply ignore
00498       case default
00499          if ( strict_ ) then
00500             error = .true.
00501             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00502                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00503          endif
00504       end select
00505       nodata = 0
00506       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00507    end do
00508    if ( .not. has_nuclides ) then
00509       has_dvar = .false.
00510       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on nuclides')
00511    endif
00512 end subroutine read_xml_type_material_xml
00513 subroutine init_xml_type_material_xml_array( dvar )

00550 subroutine read_xml_file_input_t(fname, lurep, errout)
00551    character(len=*), intent(in)           :: fname
00552    integer, intent(in), optional          :: lurep
00553    logical, intent(out), optional         :: errout
00554 
00555    type(XML_PARSE)                        :: info
00556    logical                                :: error
00557    character(len=80)                      :: tag
00558    character(len=80)                      :: starttag
00559    logical                                :: endtag
00560    character(len=80), dimension(1:2,1:20) :: attribs
00561    integer                                :: noattribs
00562    character(len=100000), dimension(1:1000)  :: data
00563    integer                                :: nodata
00564    logical                                         :: has_settings_
00565    logical                                         :: has_material_
00566    has_settings_                        = .false.
00567    has_material_                        = .false.
00568    allocate(material_(0))
00569 
00570    call init_xml_file_input_t
00571    call xml_open( info, fname, .true. )
00572    call xml_options( info, report_errors=.false., ignore_whitespace=.true.)
00573    lurep_ = 0
00574    if ( present(lurep) ) then
00575       lurep_ = lurep
00576       call xml_options( info, report_lun=lurep )
00577    endif
00578    do
00579       call xml_get( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, &
00580          data, nodata)
00581       if ( starttag /= '!--' ) exit
00582    enddo
00583    if ( starttag /= "input" ) then
00584       call xml_report_errors( info, &
00585          'XML-file should have root element "input"')
00586       error = .true.
00587       call xml_close(info)
00588       return
00589    endif
00590    strict_ = .false.
00591    error = .false.
00592    do
00593       call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00594       if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00595          write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00596          error = .true.
00597          return
00598       endif
00599       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00600          exit
00601       endif
00602       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00603          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00604             cycle
00605          else
00606             exit
00607          endif
00608       endif
00609       select case( tag )
00610       case('settings')
00611          call read_xml_type_settings_xml( &
00612             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00613             settings_, has_settings_ )
00614       case('material')
00615          call read_xml_type_material_xml_array( &
00616             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00617             material_, has_material_ )
00618       case ('comment', '!--')
00619          ! Simply ignore
00620       case default
00621          if ( strict_ ) then
00622             error = .true.
00623             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00624                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00625          endif
00626       end select
00627       nodata = 0
00628       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00629    end do
00630    if ( .not. has_settings_ ) then
00631       error = .true.
00632       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on settings_')
00633    endif
00634    if ( .not. has_material_ ) then
00635       error = .true.
00636       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on material_')
00637    endif
00638    if ( present(errout) ) errout = error
00639    call xml_close(info)
00640 end subroutine
00641 
00642 subroutine write_xml_file_input_t(fname, lurep)
00643    character(len=*), intent(in)           :: fname
00644    integer, intent(in), optional          :: lurep
00645 
00646    type(XML_PARSE)                        :: info
00647    integer                                :: indent = 0
00648 
00649    call xml_open( info, fname, .false. )
00650    call xml_options( info, report_errors=.true.)
00651    if ( present(lurep) ) then
00652        call xml_options( info, report_errors=.true.)
00653    endif
00654    write(info%lun,'(a)') &
00655       '<input>'
00656    call write_xml_type_settings_xml( info, 'settings', indent+3, settings_)
00657    call write_xml_type_material_xml_array( info, 'material', indent+3, material_)
00658    write(info%lun,'(a)') '</input>'
00659    call xml_close(info)
00660 end subroutine
00661 
00662 subroutine init_xml_file_input_t
00663 
00664 end subroutine
00665 
00666 end module
